message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. This aims to ensure a fair distribution considering the potential impact of inflation.

Considering the rejection of the previous offer and the potential effects of inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob. This aims to provide a more equitable distribution while acknowledging the risk of decreasing value over time.
